analysis.description:
Aixal.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0x5ec31d7983b8e8e4c68c9301d245feb34eeeecb8.sol#351-361) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/23/0x5ec31d7983b8e8e4c68c9301d245feb34eeeecb8.sol#356-357)
Aixal.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0x5ec31d7983b8e8e4c68c9301d245feb34eeeecb8.sol#219-223) should be declared external
Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/23/0x5ec31d7983b8e8e4c68c9301d245feb34eeeecb8.sol#42-43) should be declared external
